; Header examples from KiCad PCB files

; Valid KiCad 6.0 header
(kicad_pcb (version 20211014) (generator pcbnew))

; Valid KiCad 6.0.10 header with host
(kicad_pcb (version 20221018) (host pcbnew "(6.0.10)"))

; Valid KiCad 7.0 header
(kicad_pcb (version 20230314) (generator pcbnew))

; Invalid: old version (KiCad 5)
(kicad_pcb (version 20171130))

; Invalid: missing version
(kicad_pcb (generator pcbnew))

; Invalid: wrong root token
(kicad_sch (version 20211014))
